Faida  would like to thank Hekima for the financial support they are providing to non-bankable, women entrepreneurs, during this time of conflict in the east of the country.

loans.use: to buy a parcel of second-hand clothing for resale.

loans.name: Rose

texts.fr:
Madame Rose, âgée de 31 ans, est divorcée et mère de quatre enfants. Elle habite dans un village situé à quelques kilomètres de la ville principale. Son activité consiste à acheter pour revendre, des tissus teints et des produits cosmétiques. Cette activité, Rose la démarré très jeune au temps où elle étudiait encore : elle acheter quelques produits cosmétiques comme du parfum, qu’elle plaçait à ses copines de classe. Elle a développé peu à peu son petit commerce dont les recettes à cette période, lui permettait de régler ses petits besoins personnelles.
Rose sollicite un crédit de 75000F CFA afin d’acheter des tissus teints et des produits cosmétiques pour revendre. Elle est active le matin et l’après midi. Elle est divorcée et vit avec ses enfants, dont elle a la charge. Avec les bénéfices de son commerce, elle peut améliorer les conditions alimentaires de ses enfants. Son souci majeur est d’aider ses enfants à réussir dans la vie et à développer son activité à un niveau plus élevé.
texts.en:
Mrs. Rose, age 31, is divorced and the mother of four children. She lives in a village located a few kilometers away from the main city. Her business consists in buying and reselling dyed fabrics and cosmetics.

Rose started this business at an early age, when she was still studying. She would buy cosmetics, such as perfume, and resell them to her classmates. Gradually, she developed her retail business, which, at that time, would allow her to provide for herself.

Rose is seeking a loan of XOF 75'000 to buy dyed fabrics and cosmetics to resell. She works in the morning and in the afternoon. She's divorced and lives with her children, whom she has to support.

With the profits of her business, she manages to improve her children's dietary conditions. Her main worry is to help her children succeed in life and bring her business to a higher level.

loans.use: to buy dyed fabrics and cosmetics

loans.name: Khadim

texts.fr:
Monsieur Khadim, est un jeune commerçant qui s’active dans l’achat et la revente de matières plastiques depuis plus de 3 ans. Il est aussi chauffeur et utilise son temps libre pour conduire un véhicule qu’on lui a confié comme taxi. Khadim est actif de 8h à 13h et de 15h jusqu’à n’importe quelle heure. L’activité consiste à ramasser du plastique un peu partout, à le peser afin de le revendre aux usines qui vont le réutiliser.
Khadim s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et  de leurs besoins au quotidien.
Khadim veut améliorer son activité s’il a les moyens,voire se consacrer plus au transport.
texts.en:
Mr. Khadim is a young merchant who has been buying and reselling plasticware for more than three years. He's also a driver and makes use of his free time to drive a vehicle that's been entrusted to him as a taxi.

Khadim works from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. and then from 3 p.m. up to whatever time. His business consists in collecting plasticware just about everywhere, and weighting it in order to resell it to factories that will reuse it.

Khadim takes care of the daily expenses and needs of his family. He wants to improve his business if he can, and possibly devote himself more to transportation.

loans.use: to buy plasticware to resell to factories

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es: Jaime es un campesino de 48 años de edad, que desde que era muy niño ha estado involucrado en las tareas agropecuarias, pues sus padres le enseñaron todo lo relacionado con el cultivo de tierras y el cuidado de animales. Actualmente trabaja como operario en un cultivo de flores y, de manera independiente se dedica a producir leche, ya que posee 7 vacas que producen alrededor de 105 litros diarios, este líquido es vendido a un recolector que pasa día a día y de esta forma genera los recursos suficientes para solventar los gastos de su familia, conformada por su esposa y tres hijos. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar dos vacas productoras de leche y pagar el saldo de un crédito que tiene vigente, esto con el fin de incrementar la producción y poder vender más producto para mejorar los ingresos que percibe por su labor. Jaime sueña con darle continuidad a su actividad generadora de ingresos para poder brindar a su familia un mejor bienestar y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jaime, 48, is a farmer who has been involved in livestock farming since he was a very young child.  His parents taught him all about growing crops and caring for animals.  He currently works cultivating flowers and has established himself independently in the dairy business.  He has seven cows which produce around 105 litres a day.  He sells the milk to a collector who comes every day, and this is how he generates enough resources to cover family expenses.  He has a wife and three children.

He is requesting a new loan to buy dairy cows and pay off his current loan.  This will increase production so he can sell more and improve his income.  Jaime wants to continue his business so he can give his family a comfortable lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy two dairy cows and pay off his current loan.

loans.name: Adela María

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Adela, tiene 57 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo mayor de edad e independiente. El marido se dedica al comercio. 
Doña Adela junto al esposo se dedican a preparar almuerzos y bocadillos, él se encarga de las entregas y las ventas, en las tardes preparan pasteles, empanadas de plátano con queso, carne o pollo, jugos y batidos de fruta. Tienen  más de 20 años este negocio  que les a permitido salir adelante y darle lo mejor a su hijo.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que con los créditos ellos mejoran su negocio, con las ganancias compraron dos licuadoras con las cuales ahora está vendiendo batidos de fruta con los cuales sus ganancias están mejorando. Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar frutas  y víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos. Lleva más de 15 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. Sus sueños tener buena salud ella y su marido.
texts.en:
The Amistad communal bank meets every 15 days in the city of Tosagua. This place is known for being very dynamic, where a majority of the local people work in agriculture or raising cattle. The area has a lot of vegetation. 

This is where Adela, 57, lives. She is in a civil union and has an adult child who lives independently. Her husband is a vendor. 

Adela and her husband work by making lunches and sandwiches. He is in charge of delivery and sales in the area.  In the afternoons they make cupcakes and plantain empanadas with cheese, meat, or chicken, which are very delicious. They have had this business for over 20 years and it allows them to get ahead and provide for their son. 

She is requesting another loan because the previous ones were used to improve the business.  The profits  were used to buy two blenders that allow her to sell fruit smoothies to increase profits.   This loan will be used to buy fruits and supplies for making meals. She has been part of the communal bank for 15 years and she likes the help they provide with the loans. Her dream is for her and her husband to be healthy.

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Johanna Patricia

texts.es: Johanna es una mujer de 28 años de edad, que durante su vida productiva ha adquirido experiencia laboral trabajando como vendedora en un supermercado, y como operaria en diferentes empresas de confección pero, desde hace dos meses se encuentra desempleada, razón por la cual tomó la iniciativa de comenzar su propio negocio, un puesto de venta de empanadas y tamales que estará ubicado en la acera de su casa, esta idea surge de la necesidad de generar ingresos para el sustento familiar, ya que vive con su madre y su abuela quienes dependen económicamente de ella. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar un fogón a gas, utensilios de cocina, insumos al por mayor (verduras, carne, aceite, salsas, entre otros), así podrá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera percibir buenos ingresos para solventar las necesidades familiares. Johanna sueña con tener un negocio estable, que le genere una rentabilidad y estabilidad económica favorable para velar por el bienestar de su madre y su abuela y poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Johanna, 28, has years of experience working as a supermarket salesperson and as an operator for different sewing companies; but for two months she has been out of a job.  So she decided to take the initiative to start her own business, a food stall where she will sell empanadas and tamales.  It will be located near her home, the idea being that she can generate income for her family, since she lives with her mother and grandmother who depend on her economically.

She is requesting a loan to buy a gas burner, kitchen utensils and wholesale goods (vegetables, meat, oil, sauces, etc.) so she can start production.  She hopes to earn a good income for household needs.  

Johanna dreams about having a stable business with a good profit and economic stability so she can take care of her mother and grandmother and give them a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy a gas burner, kitchen utensils and wholesale goods (vegetables, meat, oil, sauces, etc.)

loans.name: Binetou

texts.fr: BINETOU est une femme qui habite dans le village, elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle gère une gargote  et y vend le petit déjeuner. Ce financement lui permettra de renforcer son activité. Elle aide son mari dans les charges et dépenses quotidiennes  de la famille et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Très sollicitée dans son activité, elle souhaite à l’avenir diversifier ses mets et augmenter ses revenus ainsi elle pourra améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille. BINETOU commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 13h.
texts.en: Binetou is a married mother who lives in the village, and she manages a café where she sells breakfasts. This loan will enable her to boost her business. She helps her husband with the family's daily outgoings and their children's schooling costs. Her business is in great demand and in the future she would like to be able to diversify the dishes she offers and increase her income so that she can improve her family's living conditions. Binetou begins her day at eight in the morning and finishes at one in the afternoon.

loans.use: to boost her working capital.

loans.name: Lida Maricela

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Lida, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 16, 13 y 12 años que estudian en colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Lida es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta valerse por sí misma para salir adelante y con sus ganancias contribuir con los gastos que generan la educación de sus hijos, ella elabora dulces de varios sabores y formas, son  11 años que ella prepara estos dulces los mismos que entregan a comerciantes o si no también su esposo vende en su pequeño local que tiene en el mercado.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para preparar los dulces, esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Amistad communal bank meets every 15 days in the city of Tosagua. This place is known for being very dynamic, where a majority of the habitants work in agriculture or by raising cattle. The area has a lot of vegetation. 

This is where Lida, 37, lives.  She is married and has three children, ages 16, 13 and 12 who attend school.  Her husband is a merchant.

Lida is a hard worker who likes to earn her own income and contribute to the education costs of her children.  For 11 years she has been making sweets in different flavors and shapes.  She sells to merchants and her husband also sells them at his small stall in the market.

This loan will be used to buy ingredients to make sweets.  Lida has been in the communal bank since its beginnings and she likes the help she receives through the loans.  Her dream is to give her children the best she can.

loans.use: To buy food ingredients.

loans.name: Dennys Elsa

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Dennys, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos mayores de edad, uno de sus hijos vive con ellos además de un nieto de 6 años que estudia en escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.
Doña Dennys con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante y ayudar con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, ella instala un pequeño puesto en el centro de la ciudad lugar en la cual muchos comerciantes ofrecen sus productos, además también se desplaza hasta Bahía y Calceta lugar en los cuales  ofrece sus productos,  viaja a esta ciudades en los días de ferias ya que es allí donde más personas llegan a estas ciudades. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a Perú, Quito,  Guayaquil o Ambato y esto lo realiza cuando necesita surtir su local. Tiene 9 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 12 años  y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños tener un gran local.
texts.en:
The Amistad communal bank meets every 15 days in the city of Tosagua. This place is known for being very dynamic, where a majority of the habitants work in agriculture or by raising cattle. The area has a lot of vegetation. 

This is where Dennys, 42, lives.  She is married and has four adult children, one of whom lives with them, along with a six-year-old grandson who attends school.  Her husband works in agriculture.

In an effort to earn her own income and help out with household expenses, Dennys sells all kinds of clothing.  She has a small stall in the center of town where many merchants offer their products.  She also travels to Bahía and Calceta to sell her products.  She goes there on market days since there are more people in those cities.  She buys her merchandise in Perú, Quito, Guayaquil or Ambato when she needs more stock.  She has been in business for nine years and it is doing well.

This loan will be used to buy merchandise such as pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing.  She has been a member of the communal bank for 12 years and likes the fact that she was able to start her business with one of the loans.  Her dream is to have a large shop one day.

loans.use: To buy pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Inés Narcisa

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Inés, tiene 53 años de edad, está divorciada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos,  dos mayores de edad y uno de 16 años que  estudian en colegio, dos  de ellos aun vive con ella. 
Doña Inés para salir adelante junto a su familia se dedica al comercio, ella tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  allí vende todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos le ayudan en su labor,  en su tienda ella también vende ropa de todo tipo y productos Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas). Tiene 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual afronta la dura tarea de sacar adelante sola a sus hijos.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar víveres, ropa de todo tipo y productos de Avon. Está en el Banco Comunal 12 años y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio que hoy le permite salir adelante. Sus metas son seguir adelante y darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Every 15 days in the city of Tosagua, the Amistad (friendship) loan group meets. This place is known for being very dynamic where the majority of its inhabitants work in agriculture and in raising animals, because it's an area with good vegetation.

Inés lives here, she is 53 years old, divorced, and has three children from her relationship. Two of them are adults and one is 16 and studies at school. Two of them still live with her.

To get ahead with her family, Inés works in trade. She has a convenience store in her house, and she sells all kinds of products like rice, sugar, oils, detergents, legumes, fruit and vegetables. She works everyday from 6am to 8pm and sometimes later, and her children help her with the work. She also sells all types of clothing and Avon products (beauty items, cosmetics, perfume, and ladies' accessories) in her shop. She's been working in this business for 10 years, and faces the hard work just to get her children ahead.

She is going to use this loan to supply her shop. She'll buy supplies, all kinds of clothing and Avon products. She has been in the communal bank for 12 years and likes it because she started her business with one of the loans and now it means she can get ahead. Her goals are to get ahead and give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies, clothing and Avon products.

loans.name: Rahim

texts.ru: Рахим молодой автомеханик. Ему 28 лет. Он живет и работает в городе Душанбе. Рахим женат. У него двое маленьких детей в возрасте 1 и 3 лет. Его жена домохозяйка и занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей. Таким образом Рахим единственный добытчик семьи. Он вместе с братьями работает в автосервисе и предоставляет услуги по ремонту машин. Рахим занимается этим делом в течение 13 лет. Он очень опытный автомеханик. Сейчас Рахим просит кредит для приобретения домкрата. Рахим по натуре целеустремленный человек. В будущем он планирует расширить свое дело и отдельно открыть свой автосервис.
texts.en: Rahim is a young auto mechanic. He is 28 years old. He lives and works in Dushanbe. Rahim is married and has two small children in the ages of one and three years. His wife is a homemaker and keeps the house and raises the children. So Rahim is an only provider for the family. Together with his brothers he works in the auto service and provides auto repair services. Rahim has been in this business for thirteen years. He is a very experienced mechanic. Right now Rahims is asking for a loan to buy a jack crane. Naturally Rahim is a purposeful man. In the future he plans to expand his business and open his own auto service.

loans.use: to buy a jack crane.

loans.name: Nicole Véronique

texts.fr: Nicole est une femme âgée de 48 ans, vie en concubinage. Elle est mère de 7 enfants, l'ainé est âgé de 31 ans et le dernier de 10 ans. Elle est commerçante dans un marché de la place depuis 13 ans déjà, elle vent des vivres frais (tomate, maïs)selon les saisons  grâce a l'augmentation de sa clientèle elle rencontre des grandes difficultés dans quantité de stock de sa marchandise qui est en baise par rapport à sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir de jour en jour. c'est pour pouvoir résoudre ses problèmes qu'elle se tourné vers nous pour solliciter un financement. Le bénéfice tiré de ce crédit l'aidera a satisfaire ses besoins, ceux de sa famille, aussi d'épargner pour accroitre son activité dans le future.
texts.en: Nicole is a 48-year old woman who lives with her partner. She is mother to seven children, the eldest of whom is 31 years old and the youngest ten. She has been a trader in a local market for the past 13 years now and she sells fresh food products (tomatoes, corn) according to the season. Thanks to an increase in her customer base, she is facing significant stock problems: her stock is diminishing, while her customer base is growing day by day. In order to resolve these problems she has turned to us to request a loan. The profit she makes as a result of this loan will help her to satisfy her needs as well as those of her family, and also allow her to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fresh food products.

loans.name: François

texts.fr: François est un homme de 47 ans qui vie en concubinage, il est père de 4 enfants dont l'âge vari entre 17 et 4 ans. Il est commerçant dans un marché de la place et exerce son activité depuis 11 ans et vent des draps, des rideaux et des tissus. Son activité se déroule dans des bonnes conditions mais fait très souvent face à des problèmes de rupture de stock. pour faire face à ce problème, François s'est tourné vers nous pour solliciter un crédit afin de répondre dans les délais et en quantité suffisante à la demande de sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir chaque jour. Il économisera son bénéfice pour non seulement agrandir son activité mais aussi subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: François is a 47-year old man who lives with his partner and has four children, whose ages range from four to 17 years old. He is a trader in a local market and has been carrying out this activity for the past 11 years; he sells bed sheets, curtains and fabrics. His business is going well but he often runs out of stock, so to deal with this problem, he has turned to us to request a loan so that he can meet the demands of his constantly increasing customer base on a timely basis and with sufficient stock. He will save his profits, not only to expand his business but also to be able to provide for his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy goods.

loans.name: Nyandwi's Group

texts.fr: La cliente Nabakatsi est une commerçante et membre de l’association  d’affaires «Mahoro », entrepreneur expérimentée, dynamique, âgée de 45 ans et mère de 3 enfants qui tous étudient. La cliente est une vendeuse d’habits (pagnes). Elle installe ses marchandises au long de la rue dans un quartier animé. Elle commença ses affaires avec l’assistance de son mari après  récoltes agricoles. Plus tard, elle bénéficia le prêt de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 10  ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 15 pièces de pagnes. Ainsi, elle souhaite  étendre son projet de commerce, devenir grossiste, scolariser, vêtir et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneurs non bancables, surtout ; pendant ce moment critique de guerre à l’Est du pays.
texts.en: The customer, Nabakatsi, is a businesswoman and member of the Mahoro business group. She is an experienced and dynamic entrepreneur, who is 45 years old and mother to three children who are all studying. The customer sells clothing ("pagnes" - pieces of colorful fabric). She lays out her goods along the street in a lively neighborhood. She began her business with the help of her husband after the harvest. Later on, she benefited from a loan from IMF Hekima. She has been carrying out this business for ten years now. This new loan will enable her to buy 15 "pagnes". By doing this, she would like to extend her business project, become a wholesaler, and be able to educate, clothe and feed her children. Finally, she would like to express her gratitude to Hekima for allowing female entrepreneurs, who do not have access to classic banks, autonomous, particularly during this critical period of war in the east of the country.

loans.use: to buy 15 "pagnes".

loans.name: Tanis Valdo

texts.fr: Valdo est un homme de 21 ans, il est célibataire et père d'un enfant d'un an. Il est commerçant et vent du crédit de communication dans un quartier de la cité capitale depuis 2 ans déjà. Il a une bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'il a acquis au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine. Il souhaiterait acheter du crédit de communication pour mieux gérer son stock ainsi que sa clientèle. Les bénéfices qu'il réalisera grâce à ce crédit seront en partie réinvestis dans l'activité pour accroitre son chiffre d'affaire et le reste lui permettra de s'occuper de sa famille.
texts.en: Valdo is a 21-year old bachelor who has a one-year old child. He has been a trader of telephone credit in one of the city's districts for two years now and has good knowledge of the suppliers, and, above all, his customer base which he has built up over time as a result of his experience in this field. He would like to buy telephone credit in order to be able to manage his stock and customer base better. The profits he makes as a result of this loan will be partly reinvested in his business so he can increase turnover, and the rest will enable to take care of his family.

loans.use: to buy telephone credit.

loans.name: Maqboola

texts.en:
Maqboola is a 39-year-old married woman who lives with her husband and six children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.  Her husband has been driving a taxi near the airport. He picks up the passengers from the airport and drops them off at their specific destinations. A few days ago, he had a road accident while driving the taxi and it got seriously damaged. He wants to fix the damages and perform some engine maintenance as well. 

Therefore, Maqboola has requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, which is the field partner of Kiva. Maqboola hopes that through this loan her husband will be able to repair his taxi so he can drive it again. 

Maqboola belongs to a poor family; her husband is the only single earning person. Her family lives in very miserable conditions.

loans.use: to pay for the repairs and maintenance of a taxi.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a poor but hardworking woman who is 48 years old and lives in Lahore, Pakistan. 

The living standard of her house is not good; she wants to enhance her livelihood so she can provide a better education to her children. She constantly thinks about how she can change their living standards and which strategies should be adopted to bring positive changes into her family’s life. 

Her husband provides sheltering services to the houses under construction and she wants to invest all her savings into the establishment of this current business. This is the reason she is taking a loan so her husband can grow the business. 

Parveen has requested a loan so her husband can buy sheltering materials for the growth of his current business.  She hopes that through this loan, her husband will be able to buy bamboo, planks, iron plates and nails.

loans.use: To buy sheltering materials such as bamboo, planks, iron plates and nails for her husband's business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cheese, tomatoes, oil and other ingredients to prepare pupusas.

loans.name: Mukhtaran Bibi

texts.en:
Mukhtaran Bibi is a 34-year-old woman who lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, with her husband, five sons and one daughter. Her husband is a heart patient and she constantly worries about his health. 

For 16 years, her husband has run a crockery shop, which is the only source of income for their family. All of her sons are very hardworking and help their father in his business a lot. 

Mukhtaran's husband wants to extend his earning capacity by adding more crockery items to his shop. For this, Mukhtaran Bibi has requested a loan from Kiva partner Brac Pakistan. Mukhtaran will use her portion to help her husband in purchasing more crockery items for his shop. As they have no other source of income, with the help of this loan, her husband will be able to expand his business. With the net profits, he will open a new shop for his son.

loans.use: To buy crockery items for her shop.

loans.name: Maria Alejandra

texts.es:
Maria es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tal es así que ella se encuentra estudiando en al universidad de su ciudad la carrera de agronomía, y para poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios se dedica a su negocio de venta de productos de belleza, ella cree que le va bien porque se esfuerza mucho y porque es amable con sus clientes.

Maria esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio y de esta manera poder mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Terminar su carrera y ser una gran profesional”.
texts.en:
María is a young woman with a strong will to get ahead; so strong that she is now studying Agronomy in a local university. She sells beauty products to be able to cover her expenses. She believes that she is successful because she works hard and is kind to her customers.

María wants to thank Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help they have given her she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business. Her income will improve and she will be able to continue fighting to make her dream come true: to receive her degree and become a great professional.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Sandra Carolina

texts.es: Sandra de 29 años de edad se dedica a la venta de tortillas en su casa desde hace 2 años trabaja de lunes a domingo, tiene mucha clientela pues es una persona muy trabajadora y amable, con las ganancias que obtiene y la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo, Sandra solicita un credito para comprar maiz por quintales para seguir elaborando las tortillas y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad economica junto con su esposo
texts.en:
Sandra is 29 years old and has been selling tortillas at home for two years. She works Monday to Sunday and has many customers because she is a hardworking and kind woman. With the profits she makes and the help of her husband, they manage to cover the home expenses. They both live together in a house of their own.

Sandra is requesting a loan to buy corn by the quintal [1 quintal = 100 pounds = 46 kg] to continue preparing tortillas. This will increase her profits and help her to have a more stable economy at home.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal [100 lb.]

loans.name: Ángela Lucia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Ángela, tiene 54 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos mayores de edad que viven en su casa pero independientes. Su esposo es operador de maquinaria pesada.
Doña Ángela para obtener sus propios recursos desde hace  mas de 14 años surtió una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, carnes, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su esposo le ayuda en su trabajo sobretodo en las tardes cuando el está desocupado, lleva más de 14 años  con su negocio  y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Lleva 14 años en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó su negocio. Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
In the city of Tosagua the Amistad credit group meets every two weeks. This place is known for being very dynamic where most of the residents work in agriculture and raising animals, because it is an area with a lot of vegetation.

This is where Ángela lives. She is 54 years old, married and has four grown children who live in her house but are on their own. Her husband is a heavy machine operator. In order to have her own resources, 14 years ago Ángela opened a small convenience store in her house. There she sells all types of products such as rice, sugar, detergents, legumes, vegetables, meats and fruits. She works every day from 6:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. and sometimes later. Her husband helps her in her work, especially in the afternoons when he isn't busy. She has had her business for more than 14 years and it is going well for her. 

She is going to use the loan to stock her store up more. She is going to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cold cuts, and other staple products. She has been in the credit group for 14 years. She likes it because with the first loan she started her business. Her goals are to keep going forward in her business and for her store to grow more every day.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, cold cuts and other staple products.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is married with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Imelda is 43 years old and has one child who is in school.

Imelda has a  business selling spices and vegetables in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more spices and vegetables to sell.

Imelda has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more spices and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is a married woman who has been blessed with seven children, five school-going and two who are too young for school. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Saumu operates a charcoal-selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and villagers. Her greatest monthly challenge is high cost of transportation.

She is requesting a loan of Kshs 50,000 to purchase charcoal for resale. She joined Yehu to get financial support for her business.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sweets wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Nancy Rocio

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Nancy, tiene 32 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 13 y 9 años que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido se dedica a la agricultura. 
Doña Nancy con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo para lo cual instala un pequeño puesto en el centro de la ciudad, lugar en el muchos comerciantes ofrecen sus productos, también se desplaza hasta Bahía y Calceta los días de ferias ya que es allí donde más personas llegan a estas ciudades y es cuando más vende. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a Guayaquil y Quito cuando necesita surtir su negocio. Tiene más de 7 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Lleva dos años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan para seguir adelante. Sus sueños tener un gran local.
texts.en:
In the city of Tosagua the Amistad credit group meets every two weeks. This place is known for being very dynamic where most of its residents work in agriculture and raising animals, since it is an area with a lot of vegetation. 

This is where Nancy lives. She is 32 years old and is in a common law marriage with two children, aged 13 and 9. They are in high school and elementary school. Her husband works in agriculture. In order to earn something on her own and be able to get ahead, Nancy works as a merchant. She sells all types of clothing for which she has set up a small space in the center of town, There are a lot of merchants there offering their products. She also goes to   Bahía and Calceta on market days since more people go to those cities and it's when she sells the most. She buys her merchandise in Guayaquil and Quito when she needs to stock her business. She has been doing this activity for more than 7 years and it is going very well for her.

She is going to use this loan to buy more merchandise such as pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing. She has been in the credit group for two years and she likes it because of the help they give her to get ahead. Her dreams are to have a great locale.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Olinda Beatriz

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Olinda, tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos, dos mayores de edad y uno de 17 años, dos de ellos estudian en universidad. Su esposo es empleado privado.
Doña Olinda con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante se dedica a la venta de varios artículos de catálogos como zapatos, ropa y bisuterías, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y a cualquier parte que ella va lleva su revista la misma que les muestra a sus clientes y estos le hacen pedidos los mismos que luego de varios días entrega y cobra por semanas. Tiene más de 10  años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual les ayuda a sus hijos con los gastos de sus  estudios.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: ropa, zapatos y bisuterías. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 10 años  y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños tener un gran local.
texts.en:
Every fortnight the "Amistad" group meets in the city of Tosagua.  Tosagua is known for being very dynamic; the majority of inhabitants work in agriculture and raising animals as there is a lot of vegetation here.

And it is here in Tosagua that Olinda lives.  She is 39 years old, married, and has three children - two now adults, the other 17 years old.  Two of the children are at university and Olinda's husband works for a private company.

In order to earn some money on her own and to get ahead in life, Olinda works selling various catalogue items such as a shoes, clothes, and costume jewellery.  She sells door-to-door and, wherever she goes, she carries her catalogues to show to her customers.  They then make orders and, a few days later, Olinda delivers the order, collecting payments every week.  Olinda has been doing this work for over ten years and, with it, she is able to support her children with the costs of their education.

Olinda will use this loan in order to buy more merchandise, such as clothes, shoes and costume jewellery.  Olinda has been with the loan group for ten years and she likes it as, with one of the loans, she was able to start her business.  Olinda's dream is to have large premises for her business.

loans.use: to buy shoes, clothes, and costume jewellery.

loans.name: Jacinto Manuel

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive don Jacinto, tiene 34 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre, su mujer está embarazada de su primer bebé el cual esperan con mucha emoción. La mujer es ama de casa. 
El señor Jacinto es un hombre muy trabajador que para que a su familia no le falte lo necesario para vivir se dedica al comercio, el tres o cuatro veces por semana se desplaza en un carro de su hermano hasta una granja de la localidad lugar en la cual compra pollos los mismos que luego lleva a entregar al por mayor a comerciantes de diferentes mercados que hay en la localidad, ya son 4 años que lleva realizando esta actividad con la cual logra darle lo mejor a su esposa y espera darle lo mejor a su bebé.
Este crédito es para comprar pollos. Lleva más de 3 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan los créditos. Sus sueños es que nazca bien su bebé.
texts.en:
Every fortnight the "Amistad" group meets in the city of Tosagua.  Tosagua is known for being very dynamic; the majority of inhabitants work in agriculture and raising animals as there is a lot of vegetation here.

And it is here in Tosagua that Jacinto lives.  He is 34 years old and has a partner, a housewife, who is pregnant with their first child.  The couple are very excited about the baby.  

Jacinto works very hard to make sure his family has everything they need.  Jacinto has a business.  Three or four times a week he goes out to a local farm in his brother's car.  At the farm, he buys chickens which he sells in bulk at different local markets.  Jacinto has been doing this work for four years and, with it, he is able to give his wife a better life and he hopes to do this for his baby too.

This loan will be used to buy chickens.  Jacinto has been part of this loan group for three years and he likes it because of the help that the loans give him.  Jacinto's dream is for his baby to born healthy.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Orfelina Del Carmen

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Orfelina, tiene 62 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene seis hijos mayores de edad, una hija vive en su casa. El marido trabaja en un comedor. 
Doña Orfelina es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de productos Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Los mismos que vende puerta a puerta, ella trabaja todos los  días ya que además en su casa tiene una pequeña granja de pollos en la cual mete hasta 100 pollos por temporada, con lo cual se gana algo extra si salir de su casa. Tiene más de 8  años que se dedica a sus ventas y con la granja mucho más tiempo.
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos,  alimentos y medicinas para los pollos. Lleva más de 10 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan los créditos. Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su vida y su negocio.
texts.en:
Every fortnight the "Amistad" group meets in the city of Tosagua.  Tosagua is known for being very dynamic; the majority of inhabitants work in agriculture and raising animals as there is a lot of vegetation here.

And it is here in Tosagua that Orfelina lives. She is 62 years old and has a partner and six children, all now adults.  One of the couple's daughters still lives at home.  Orfelina's partner works in a restaurant.

Orfelina is a housewife but to earn her own money and support her husband with household costs, she also sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women's accessories).  Orfelina sells door-to-door.  She works every day as she also has a small chicken farm - with up to 100 chickens per season - in her home.  With this work, she is able to earn a little extra money, without even having to leave the house.  Orfelina has been selling Avon products for eight years and has been working with the chickens much longer.

This loan will be used to buy perfumes, creams and cosmetics, and feed and medicine for the chickens.  Orfelina has been part of this loan group for over ten years and she likes it because she receives loans.  Orfelina's dream is continue prospering in life and in her business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, and cosmetics, and chicken feed and medicines.

loans.name: Nancy Mercedes

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Nancy, tiene 52 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa y estudian en universidad. El marido es chofer. 
Doña Nancy aprendió corte y confección hace muchos años en una academia en la localidad y hoy tiene un pequeño taller de costura en su casa, allí además de elaborar prendas nuevas también realiza arreglos en las prendas que sus clientes, en temporadas de entrada a clases lo que más elabora son uniformes, son más de 30 años que lleva realizando esta actividad con la cual ha podido ayudarle a su marido a sacar adelante a su hijos brindándoles una buena educación para que ellos se forjen un mejor porvenir
Este crédito es para comprar telas, hilos, cierres, botones y otros  materiales de costura. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan en el grupo para salir adelante. Sus sueños es que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
In the city of Tosagua the Amistad credit group meets every two weeks. This place is known for being very dynamic where most of its residents work in agriculture and in raising animals, because it has a lot of vegetation.

This is where Nancy lives. She is 52 years old and is in a common law marriage from which she has three grown children. Two of them still live in her house and go to college. Her husband is a driver.  

Nancy learned cutting and sewing many years ago in an academy in her community. Today she has a small sewing workshop in her house. In addition to making new clothing she repairs her customers' clothing. When the school year is starting what she makes the most are uniforms. she has been doing this activity for more than 30 years and has been able to help her husband get their children ahead, offering them a good education so that they can make a better future.

This loan is to buy fabric, thread, zippers, buttons and more sewing materials. She has been in the credit group since the beginning and she likes it because of the help the group offers for getting ahead. Her dream is for her children to have good careers.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, zippers, buttons and other sewing materials.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 50 years old and married with four children, one of whom is in school, Julieta works very hard to provide for them.

Julieta runs an Avon products direct sales business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of Avon products to sell.

Julieta has been in this business for one year. 

In the future Julieta would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of Avon products to sell

loans.name: Sawe Rahayu Indah Group

texts.en:
After successfully maintaining pigs to sell when fattened, Ni Komang needs new loan to help her plan to keep pigs for pig roll. She will use the loan to purchase local pigs and fatten them for two months and then sell them. She will follow the same program until the repayment day comes. So for the one loan period, she can sell three times. 

With the support from her husband and monitoring from the Loan Officer and the Vet, she hopes all her plans will run smoothly and she will be successful. One member resigned because she has enough savings, and she was replaced by a new member.

loans.use: to purchase local pigs to raise

loans.name: Saut

texts.en: Saut is 52 years old. She is married and resides with eight children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been cultivating vegetables for more than three years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband, who is joining her in the picture, is involved in animal husbandry. He makes an income of $5 every day. Three of her children are employed. They earn about $15 daily. Due to lack of funds, Saut is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase construction materials to fix her house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn Bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase constrution materials to fix her house

loans.name: Rosa Lilian

texts.es: Rosa de 37 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos de 16 y 9 años de edad. Rosa se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortilla desde hace dos años. Este negocio le permite complementar los ingresos de su esposo para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Sus condiciones habitacionales son muy humildes y sencillas y con mucho esfuerzo han logrado construir su vivienda. Desea construir una pila para almacenar el agua ya que actualmente la que tiene esta deteriorada y se le filtra el agua causando desperdicios. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para comenzar la construcción de la pila que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en: Thirty-seven-year-old Rosa lives in her own house with her husband and children, aged 16 and 9 years old each.  Rosa has been working making and selling tortillas for two years.  This business allows her to complement her husband's income in order to give their children a better quality of life.  The family's living conditions are humble and simple but, with a lot of effort, the family has been able to build their own home.  Rosa now wants to build a sink in order to store water.  The sink that she currently has leaks and so they are losing water.  Rosa is applying to FUSAI for this loan in order to buy bricks, cement, sand, and to pay labourers to start building the sink that she so desperately needs.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and to pay labourers to start building a sink.

loans.name: Blanca Thelma

texts.es: Blanca de 43 años de edad es madre soltera de tres hijos y habita junto a ellos en casa propia. Blanca se dedica a la venta de deliciosas pupusas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, queso, frijoles, etc.), de esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar y satisface las necesidades básicas de sus hijos. Su vivienda es su único patrimonio y es lo que desea heredar a sus hijos. Actualmente la cubierta del techo de la vivienda se encuentra dañada y es necesario repararlo, es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para cambiar el techo lo antes posible y dar a sus hijos mayor seguridad.
texts.en: Blanca is 43 years old and a single mother to three children, who still live at home.  Blanca owns the house where they live and makes a living selling "pupusas" (a corn-based food with cheese, beans, and meat).  With this work she is able to support the household and cover her children's basic needs.  The house is all Blanca has and she wants to leave it to her children.  The roof of the house is damaged and needs to be repaired.  Blanca is, therefore, applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy galvanised laminate sheets and wood in order to replace the roof as soon as possible, and give her children better security in the home.

loans.use: to buy galvanised laminate sheets and wood in order to replace the roof of her home.

loans.name: Damira

texts.ru: Дамире 34 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Дети все маленькие, самому старшему ребенку 11 лет, самому младшему 2 года. У Дамиры - высшее образование, работает преподавателем в местной школе, имеет небольшую зарплату. Супруг работает разнорабочим, постоянной работы не имеет. Дамира в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Дамиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 7 дойных коров, 1 лошадь, 6 овец. Дамира очень трудолюбивая, встает на заре, готовит детей к школе, затем режет сено и поит домашний скот, идет на работу, возвращается в обед, опять кормит скот, встречает детей со школы, убирается по дому, готовит кушать, убирается в хлеву и так каждый день. Она очень целеустремленная и верит, что занимаясь упорно и плотно животноводством, она сможет улучшить благосостояние своей семьи и обеспечить хорошее будущее для своих детей. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Дамира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Дамира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en:
Damira is 34 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising four children. All of her children are little, with the oldest being 11 years old and the youngest, 2 years old. Damira has a higher education. She works as a teacher at a local school. She has a small salary. Her husband works odd jobs as he cannot find full-time employment. 

As an additional source of income for her family, Damira practices livestock breeding. She started this business 14 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Damira's hard work, she currently has 7 milk cows, 1 horse and 6 sheep on her farm. Damira is very hardworking. Everyday she gets up at the crack of dawn and gets her children ready for school. Then she cuts hay and waters her livestock, goes to work, returns home for lunch, feeds her livestock again, meets her children at school, brings them home, feeds them dinner and finishes her work in the barn. 

She is very motivated and believes that by working hard and consistently on her animal breeding business, she will be able to improve her family's wellbeing and provide a better future for her children. Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Damira turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Damira plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for the Christmas season

loans.name: Chinara

texts.ru: Чинаре 35 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Чинары - высшее образование, работает преподавателем в местной школе. Чинара очень любит детей, поэтому она выбрала эту профессию. Соседи и коллеги характеризуют ее как добрую, порядочную и понятливую женщину. Она со всей душой относится к своей работе-преподаванию. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Чинара занимается животноводством, стартовав 15 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Чинары, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 8 дойных коров, 17 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Чинара обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Чинара планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Chinara is 35 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising three children. Chinara has a higher education. She works as a teacher at a local school. Chinara really loves children which is why she chose this profession. Her neighbors and coworkers characterize her as a kind, respectable and intelligent woman. She puts her heart and soul in to her job as a teacher. As an additional source of income for her family, Chinara practices livestock breeding. She started this business 15 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Chinara's hard work, she currently has 8 milk cows and 17 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Chinara turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Chinara plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: María de 57 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida. María se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Esta ocupación le permite llevar el sustento diario  y ayudar a su compañero de vida quien es albañil con la economía del hogar. Desea construir un corredor en su vivienda ya que en la actualidad no tiene y esto le perjudica cuando llueve y cuando hace sol. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, lámina, cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para comenzar a construir el corredor que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en: María is 57 years old and lives in her own house with her partner.  For a long time now María has been making a living offering services doing domestic chores.  This work has allowed her to bring home an income and help her partner, a builder, with the household bills.  María wants to build a hall in her home.  She does not currently have one and this poses problems in times of rain or sun.  María is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy bricks, laminate sheets, cements, sand. and to pay labourers to start building the hall she so desperately needs.

loans.use: to buy bricks, laminate sheets, cements, sand. and to pay labourers to start building a hall in her home.

loans.name: Socorro Del Carmen

texts.es: Socorro de 49 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hijo, ella se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Con mucho esfuerzo logró sacar adelante a sus hijos quienes a la fecha ya son mayores de edad e independientes. Desea mejorar el techo de la vivienda el cual en la actualidad se encuentra deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, y clavos y así hacer el cambio de techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Forty-nine-year-old Socorro lives in her own house with her son.  She has been making a living as a domestic servant for a long time now.  With a lot of effort, she has helped her children to get ahead and they are now independent adults.  Socorro wants to improve the roof on her home as it is currently in bad condition.  Soocorro is therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy galvanized laminate sheeting, wood, and nails, in order to change the roof on her home as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate sheeting, wood, and nails, in order to change the roof on her home.

loans.name: Jurabek

texts.en:
Jurabek is a repeat borrower of IMON.  He is kind and good man.  Jurabek is 61 years old, married and has 3 children.  Also, he is a lovely grandfather to his grandchildren. 

Jurabek began his own business in animal husbandry more than 9 years ago because he needed to earn money.  Jurabek fattens cattle for some months and than sells them in a local market.  He has regular customers at this local market.  

He is going to increase working capital and in this way to improve his business.  He is asking for a loan of 2250 USD to buy cattle.  He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle to increase his working capital

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda es una mujer muy trabajadora y de condición humilde, pero sobre todo es muy luchadora, cada día se levanta muy temprano ya que ella tiene su negocio de crianza de animales, venta de leche y también tiene una pequeña parcela  en la cual ha sembrado maíz, para poder vender y darle de comer a sus animales el tallo de la planta; Hilda es madre de 3 hijos y por ello ella lucha para poder darles una vida digna y mejor de la que ella tuvo.

Hilda está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar alimentos balanceados para sus animales y de esta manera tener animales bien alimentados, así Hilda seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Mejorar su calidad de vida
texts.en:
Hilda is a very hardworking and humble woman, but above all, she is a true fighter. Every day she gets up very early as she her business is in rearing animals and selling milk, and she also has a small plot of land in which she sells corn in order to sell and provide her animals with plants to eat. 

Hilda is a mother to three children and that is why she strives to make it in live to give them a better and more dignified life than she had.

Hilda is very grateful to the Kiva loan lenders as it is thanks to your support she will be able to buy animal feed and in this manner keep her cattle well fed. Hence Hilda will continue fighting to make her biggest dream a reality, that of improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Nronga

texts.en:
Nronga is married mother of three school-going children.  She lives in her own house that has electricity, but not piped water.

She make soft drinks and ice cubes using fruits and juice flavors and sells it to her neighbors and passersby.  She cites seasonality as her major challenge.

With this loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase juice flavors and fruits for the business.  She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase juice flavors and fruits for her soft drink business

loans.name: Dina's Group

texts.en:
Dina, a young mother of one little kid, is a citizen of Kampong Cham province.  For the sake of her kid, she does rice farming on a one-hectare area and runs a small vending shop to earn additional income.

Her five years of experience in her current business have helped her to earn around 40,000 KHR per day. Never having been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), Dina teamed up with a group of four to get her first loan. She and two of her co-borrowers are seeking 1,000,000 KHR each, while a remaining borrower is applying for 500,000 KHR. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for reaping fees. She hopes that she can gain a good yield, better than before.

loans.use: to pay reaping fee

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es: Luz está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio de venta de llantas y artículos de repuestas para motos y autos, así ella podrá atender los pedidos de sus clientes y seguir luchando cada día para poder salir adelante y hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Poder ser una gran distribuidora de repuestos”.
texts.en: Luz is very grateful to the Kiva loan lenders as it is thanks to the support that she will be able to buy merchandise for her business selling tires and spare parts for motorbikes and cars. In this manner she will be able to meet her customers' orders and continue fighting every day to get ahead in life and make her biggest dream a reality, that of being a large spare parts distributor.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as tires and spare parts for vehicles.

loans.name: Luz De La Esperanza Group

texts.es: El grupo “LUZ DE LA ESPERANZA “está conformada por 07 socias trabajadores quienes se sienten contento por estar pasando el 08 ciclo. Simón tiene 39 años  es soltero con hijo de 08 años de edad al cual educa. Hace 04 años se dedica a ser conductor de coaster. Años atrás se dedicaba  al comercio de frutas en un mercado. En sus tiempo libres se dedica a conducir mototaxi y a prestar servicios de albañil.  El préstamo lo usara en el pago de las cuotas de su vivienda ya que lo obtuvo para pagar en cuota. Simón tiene como fin retornar al comercio de frutas. Pero en esta oportunidad en un local propio. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Simón es el tercero del lado derecho tiene puesto una gorra celeste con gris.
texts.en:
“Luz de la esperanza” [Light of hope] is composed of seven hardworking members who feel happy to reach their eighth cycle. Simón is 39 years old. He is single and has an eight-year-old son under his care. Simón has been driving a minivan for four years, but he used to sell fruits at the market. During his free time, he drives a mototaxi or works as a mason.

He will use this loan to pay the installments of his home loan. Simón plans to return to the fruits business, but this time in his own establishment. The members want to thank Kiva lenders for this loan. Simón is third from right to left and is wearing a gray and blue cap.

loans.use: to pay for his home loan installments.

loans.name: Savrullo

texts.en:
Savrullo is an entrepreneur who is married and has children.  

He has been working in animal sales for more than 25 years.  Little by little, with the passing of the years, he has perfected his knowledge.  Thanks to the good condition of his animals, he has managed to gain a large number of customers for his business. He sells his animals in the local market.  Many of his customers are local butchers who are pleased with his product.

Savrullo is looking for a loan to buy young cattle. This way, he will be able to offer his customers good animals and continue to make financial progress, providing his household with good earnings. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle to sell

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer muy trabajadora, es madre de 3 hijos los cuales ya son mayores y a quienes ha sacado adelante con el apoyo de su esposo ya que ellos siempre les han inculcado que con trabajo y sacrificio todo se puede; la vivienda de Juana se ubica en la ciudad de Camaná, ciudad que se caracteriza porque se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de arroz, pallares, maíz, entre otros; asimismo se desarrolla la pesca y sobre todo encontramos diversidad de comidas típicas, entre las cuales se encuentra el delicioso “Chupe de Camarones”. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho pasear junto a su familia para poder compartir. Día a día Juana trabaja en su negocio de venta de bollo, alfajores, gaseosas, alfajores, entre otros; ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día, ya que con el fruto de su trabajo puedo apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque trabaja con mucho gusto y sobre todo por sus ganas de salir adelante.

Juana es muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su apoyo ya que en esta oportunidad podrá compra insumos para la elaboración de sus dulces principalmente harina por sacos y mercadería para las fiestas navideñas,  así ella seguirá trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un local para la venta de sus productos”.
texts.en:
Juana is a very hardworking woman, she is a mother to three children who are adults and who she has managed to help get ahead in life with the support of her husband as they have always instilled in them that through work and sacrifice anything can be achieved. Juana's home is located in the city of Camaná, a city which is characterized by agriculture, and in particular the cultivation of rice, Lima beans, corn and so on. Fishing is also carried out in the area and above all there is a wide variety of typical foods among which there is the delicious dish of "Chupe de Camarones" [prawn soup]. 

When she has a bit of free time, she very much likes going for a walk with her family to share a moment together. From day to day Juana works in her business selling buns, sweet pastries, fizzy drinks and so on. She works around 8 hours a day as with the fruit of her work she manages to support her husband with the household costs. She believes that her business is going well because she works cheerfully and above all because of her desire to get ahead in life.

Juana is very grateful to the Kiva loan lenders as this is the second time that they have lent her a hand; this time round she will be able to buy supplies to make her sweet goods, namely flour by the bad and merchandise for the Christmas period. In this way she will continue to work to make her biggest dream a reality, that of having a site to sell her products.

loans.use: to buy bags of flour and merchandise for the Christmas period.

loans.name: Maria Del Pilar

texts.es:
Maria tiene 35 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de imperial, ciudad caracterizada por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de manzana, maíz, frejoles, entre otros. Maria es una joven con muchas aspiraciones, sobre todo porque es madre soltera y su pequeña hija tiene 4 años de edad, y es su mayor adoración y sobre todo lucha mucho cada día para poder brindarle una vida digna y sobre todo para que su pequeña sea una persona de bien.
Cada día Maria trabaja como empleada en una casa, ella realiza las labores de limpieza y con el fruto de su trabajo saca adelante a su hija a pesar de las adversidades y problemas que se presentan; Maria cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable y sobre todo honrada.

Maria está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le dan su gran apoyo y gracias a ello podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder realizar mejoras en la vivienda donde habita, con lo cual mejorara la calidad de vida de su hija y con ello seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”Darle una profesión a su hija y tener un gran negocio de confección de prendas”.
texts.en:
Maria is 35 years old.  She lives in Imperial, a city known for having a warm and welcoming climate.  Additionally, agriculture flourishes there, especially apples, corn, and beans, among others.  Maria is a young woman with many hopes, above all because she is a single mother.  Her young daughter is four years old and is her great love.  Above all, Maria struggles greatly every day to be able to give her daughter a respectable life, so that her little one can be a good person.

Maria works every day as an employee in a home.  She does cleaning jobs, and with what she earns she gets her daughter ahead, in spite of the adversities and problems that arise.  Maria believes that she is getting ahead because she is very responsible and, above all, trustworthy.

Maria is very grateful to Kiva lenders because this is the second time that they have given her their support.  Thanks to their support she will be able to buy construction materials to make some improvements in the home where she lives, and in that way improve her daughter’s quality of life.  In this way, she can keep fighting to be able to make her greatest dream come true: to allow her daughter to become a professional, and to have a big business sewing garments.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Kibibi

texts.en:
Kibibi is married and has four children, all of whom go to school.  She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water.  Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

Kibibi has operated a coconut-selling business for the past three years, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. 

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase 2 sacks of coconuts for resale.  She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sacks of coconuts  for resale

loans.name: Lornah

texts.en:
Lornah appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards and enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income.  

She is requesting a new loan of ksh.72,480 to purchase bales of clothes for resale . 

She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Sarann's Group

texts.en:
Sarann is 36 years old, a mother of five children, and a villager from Battambang province.  She covers her daily living expenses via rice cropping on five hectares as her main source of income.  She has engaged in her current business for more than 10 years.  

This is not the first loan for Sarann with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully paid back her past loan wisely and it has helped to stabalize her living situation.  Now, she leads a group of three to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay a harvesting fee for her rice crop. She hopes that she will have a good yield to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To pay a harvesting fee for her rice crop

loans.name: Malay's Group

texts.en:
Malay is a 46-year-old villager from the Moung Russey district of Battmbang province. She is a married mother who is blessed with seven children. Malay struggles to provide for the daily costs of living and is a rice farmer who also supplements her income with a pig-raising business and a rice-milling service. She has borrowed and repaid six previous loans with the Kiva partner VisionFund and has used her profits to improve her livelihood.

Malay is the leader of a loan group comprised of five female borrowers each requesting a 1,400,000 KHR loan. She will use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and rice seeds for her farmland. Malay hopes that she can triple her crop yield.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seeds

loans.name: Batma

texts.ru: Батме 47 лет, вдова, одна воспитывает 2 детей. Старшей дочери 17 лет, она ученица 11 класса, сыну - 13 лет, он ученик 7 класса. Батма и ее дети остались без главного члена их семьи, без отца и супруга. Батма до сих пор тяжело переживает утрату, но видя своих детей понимает, что нужно жить дальше и обеспечить достойное будущее для своих детей. У нее в мечтах выучить своих детей в престижных университетах, чтоб дети имели хорошую профессию. К сожалению сама Батма закончила только школу и на протяжении 16 лет занимается животноводством, начав с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Батмы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 15 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Батма обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Батма планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Batma is 47 years old, widowed, and raising 2 children by herself. Her older daughter is 17 years old and is a student in the eleventh grade. Her son is 13 years old and a student in the seventh grade. Batma and her children were left without the main member of their family, without a father and husband. She dreams that her children will study at a prestigious university so that the will have good jobs. Unfortunately, Batma only finished secondary school and for the last 16 years has been in the business of animal breeding. She started this business 16 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Batma's hard work, she currently has 2 milk cows and 15 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 7,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Batma turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Batma plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes de 67 años de edad habita junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño nieto de 14 años de edad. Mercedes se dedica a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad. Sus condiciones habitacionales son muy humildes y con mucho esfuerzo junto a su compañero de vida han logrado construir su casa. Desea construir una pila ya que la que tiene actualmente se encuentra deteriorada  y el agua se filtra causándole muchos desperdicios. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava y pago de mano de obra para construir la pila que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 67 and lives with her common-law husband and their small nephew, aged 14. She sells clothing as a street trader in various parts of her community. The condition of her house is very humble and, with a lot of effort, she and her husband have managed to build their house together.

Mercedes wants to build a sink, because the one she has currently is in need of repair and the water that leaks from it is causing a lot of waste. She is asking for this loan through FUSAI to invest in buying bricks, cement, sand and gravel, as well as paying workers to build the sink that she needs so much.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and gravel, as well as paying workers to build a sink.

loans.name: Corazon De Jesus Group

texts.es: El grupo” CORAZON DE JESUS” está conformada por 09 socios trabajadores y emprendedores. Susana tiene 31 años es soltera. Hace poco  implemento su panadería  en su vivienda en el cual ofrece panes biscochos queques.  En la actualidad Susana está elaborando panetones el cual los expende a un buen precio.  Y a la vez tiene un kiosco en el que trabaja en horas de la tarde vendiendo golosinas y gaseosas. Es de esta manera que puede apoyar a su familia económicamente. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de de harina azúcar huevos. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Susana es la persona parada del ladi izquierdo viste polo negro.
texts.en:
The Corazon de Jesus (Heart of Jesus) Group is made up of nine hard-working and enterprising members.  

Susana is 31 years old and single.  A little while ago, she started her bakery in her home, where she offers breads, sponge cake, and various cakes. Susana is currently making panetones (or Panettones, Christmas cakes), which she can sell for a good price.  At the same time she also has a stand where she works in the afternoon selling sweets and sodas.  This is how she is able to support her family financially.  The loan will be invested in the purchase of flour, sugar, and eggs.  

The group is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the loan they have offered.  Susana is the person standing on the left side; she is wearing a black shirt.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and eggs.

loans.name: Sandy Roxana

texts.es:
